description: The unit of work requested for execution in a job list and a work request shall be defined as a job order. A job order references an associated work master.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: correspondsToWorkMaster
contents.description: The work master applied to this job order.

contents.name: correspondsToRequirement
contents.description: The segment requirement(s) within the scope of an operations request that specifically relates to this job order.

contents.name: containsParameter
contents.description: The job order parameters related to this job order

contents.name: containsPersonnel
contents.description: The personnel requirement(s) related to this job order

contents.name: containsEquipment
contents.description: The equipment requirement(s) related to this job order

contents.name: containsPhysicalAsset
contents.description: The physical asset requirement(s) related to this job order

contents.name: containsMaterial
contents.description: The material requirement(s) related to this job order

contents.name: description
contents.description: Additional information about the process segment

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.description: Optional relationship to hierarchy.
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: workType
contents.description: Describes the category of the activity
contents.comment: Required attribute. Possible values are: production, maintenance, quality, inventory, or mixed

enumValues.name: mixed
enumValues.comment: can be used when the activity contains several categories

contents.name: workMasterID
contents.description: Identifies the associated work master to be used

contents.name: workMasterVersion
contents.description: Identifies the version of the associated work master to be used.

contents.name: segmentRequirementID
contents.description: A unique identification of the segment requirement within the scope of an operations request that specifically relates to the job order

contents.name: startTime
contents.description: When work is to be started.

contents.name: endTime
contents.description: When work is to be completed.

contents.name: priority
contents.description: The priority of the job order.

contents.name: dispatchStatus
contents.description: Identifies the status of the entry from the perspective of the dispatch activity.

contents.name: command
contents.description: Identifies the action the execution management activity is to perform on the job order.

contents.name: commandRule
contents.description: Instruction to execution management activities specifying conditions to execute the command.
